description: Zoey`s Leafeon was first seen in a practice contest battle against Dawn in Mecabbage Town. It battled alongside Zoey`s Kirlia against Dawn`s Mamoswine and Cyndaquil. Zoey effectively combined her Kirlia`s and Leafeon`s Magical Leaf attacks with Kirlia`s Psychic to knock out both of Dawn`s Pok√©mon with a single hit.
name: Leafia (Nozomi)
